main.5: If in a fight, hit first and hit hard.

main.7: Never Give Up On Anybody. Miracles Happen Everyday.

main.9: Be Brave. Even if You’re Not, Pretend to Be. No One Can Tell the Difference.

main.12: Choose your life’s mate carefully. From this one decision will come 90 percent of all your happiness or misery.

main.13: Make it a habit to do nice things for people who will never find out.

main.14: Lend only those books you never care to see again.

main.15: Never deprive someone of hope; it might be all they have.

main.16: When playing games with children, let them win.

main.17: Give people a second chance, but not a third.

main.19: Become the most positive and enthusiastic person you know.

main.20: Loosen up. Relax. Except for rare life-and-death matters, nothing is as important as it first seems.

main.21: Don’t allow the phone to interrupt important moments. It’s there for our convenience, not the callers.

main.24: Think twice before burdening a friend with a secret.

main.25: When someone hugs you, let them be the first to let go.

main.26: Be modest. A lot was accomplished before you were born.

main.28: Beware of the person who has nothing to lose.

main.29: Don’t burn bridges. You’ll be surprised how many times you have to cross the same river

main.30: Live your life so that your epitaph could read: No regrets.

main.31: Be bold and courageous. When you look back on life, you’ll regret the things you didn’t do more than the ones you did.

main.32: Never waste an opportunity to tell someone you love them.

main.33: Remember no one makes it alone. Have a grateful heart and be quick to acknowledge those who helped you.

main.34: Take charge of your attitude. Don’t let someone else choose it for you

main.35: Visit friends and relatives when they are in the hospital; you only need to stay a few minutes.

main.36: Begin each day with some of your favourite music.

main.37: Once in a while, take the scenic route.

main.38: Send a lot of Valentine cards. Sign them, ‘Someone who thinks you’re terrific.’

main.39: Answer the phone with enthusiasm and energy in your voice.

main.40: Keep a Note Pad and Pencil on Your Bed-Side Table. Million-Dollar Ideas Sometimes Strike at 3 a.m.

main.41: Show respect for everyone who works for a living, regardless of how trivial their job.

main.42: Send Your Loved one’s Flowers. Think of a Reason Later.

main.43: Make someone’s day by paying the toll for the person in the car behind you.

main.47: Compliment the meal when you’re a guest in someone’s home.

main.48: Wave at the children on a school bus.

main.49: Remember that 80% of the success in any job is based on your ability to deal with people.

main.50: Don’t expect life to be fair.

mine.1: Be Ashamed to die until you've won victory for humanity.

mine.2: Tomorrow is the first-day for the rest of your life. You need to decide whether you will live or survive it.

mine.3: You born alone and you die alone and this world just drops a bunch of rules to make you forget those facts. Never forget that.

mine.4: Make mistakes, Learn from them, Don't regret them.

mine.5: It's always better to regret for the things that you did than you didn't.

mine.6: Make mistakes, Learn from them, Don't regret them.

mine.7: Don't just aspire to make a living, aspire to make a difference

mine.8: Just because you don’t share it on social media, doesn't mean you’re not up to big things. Live it and stay low key. Privacy is everything.

mine.9: Without commitment, you'll never start. But more importantly, without consistency, you'll never finish.

mine.10: Do what you gotta do so you can do what you wanna do.

mine.11: Life's barely long enough to get good at one thing. So be careful what you get good at.

mine.12: No matter how hard you try you won't get more than 86400 seconds in a day, make it count.

mine.13: if you change nothing, nothing will change.

mine.14: If you pray for the rain, you gotta deal with the mud too. That's part of it.
